mapper.sql: id, addtime, deletestate, classname, display, pid, seq
mapper.select:
select
from tb_classes where pid = #{pid} order by seq asc

select c1.id, c1.addtime, c1.deletestate, c1.classname, c1.display, c1.pid, c1.seq, c2.id as sonId, c2.classname as sonClassname, c2.pid as sonpid from tb_classes c1 left join tb_classes c2 on c1.id=c2.pid where c1.pid = #{pid}

select c1.id, c1.addtime, c1.deletestate, c1.classname, c1.display, c1.pid, c1.seq, c2.id as sonId, c2.classname as sonClassname, c2.pid as sonpid, c3.id as son2Id, c3.classname as son2Classname, c3.pid as son2pid from tb_classes c1 left join tb_classes c2 on c1.id=c2.pid left join tb_classes c3 on c2.id=c3.pid where c1.pid = #{pid}

select c1.id, c1.addtime, c1.deletestate, c1.classname, c1.display, c1.pid, c1.seq, c2.id as sonId, c2.classname as sonClassname, c2.pid as sonpid from tb_classes c1 left join tb_classes c2 on c1.id=c2.pid where c1.id = #{id}

select c1.id, c1.addtime, c1.deletestate, c1.classname, c1.display, c1.pid, c1.seq, c2.id as sonId, c2.classname as sonClassname, c2.pid as sonpid, c3.id as son2Id, c3.classname as son2Classname, c3.pid as son2pid from tb_classes c1 left join tb_classes c2 on c1.id=c2.pid left join tb_classes c3 on c2.id=c3.pid where c1.pid = 0 and c1.display = 1 order by c1.seq asc
mapper.insert: insert into tb_classes (addtime, classname, display, pid, seq) values (#{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{classname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{display,jdbcType=BIT}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into tb_classes
id,
addtime,
deletestate,
classname,
display,
pid,
seq,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{deletestate,jdbcType=BIT},
#{classname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{display,jdbcType=BIT},
#{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update tb_classes
addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deletestate = #{deletestate,jdbcType=BIT},
classname = #{classname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
display = #{display,jdbcType=BIT},
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_classes set addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deletestate = #{deletestate,jdbcType=BIT}, classname = #{classname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, display = #{display,jdbcType=BIT}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
